bwwExcerpt: These artists’ respective “Chicago,” “Hamilton” and “The Producers” have given a lot to the city that their latest, lesser creation is named after. SEE ALSO Director Martin Scorsese's 1977 flop 'New York, New York' is now a new Broadway musical. Forgotten Scorsese film flop gets a second chance — on Broadway.
